## DateTimePickerOptions.pickerPeriodsOrder property

Order of pickers, it's possible use less pickers as is defined in pickerPeriodsDefinition for example 'month,year'

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
pickerPeriodsOrder?: string[] | string;
```
